Okay,

About the question about the Ark. I have thought about it all day to=
day and
this is what I have come up with, if it's okay with the rest of you=
. We DO
know about the Ark and where it is.

Why? Too many character's hist=
ories are tied to it. Most of the Predacons
and Maximals that are around on=
 Earth have fought battles there, in fact
there was a gigantic battle fough=
t there about a year ago (Real Time). Also
one of my characters, Legacy, is=
 a guardian of the Ark, although he has been
called away to the old Maximal=
 Base for the moment.

That's what I'm rolling with, with my next posts to =
keep it as smooth as
possible :)

Preston

rest of you. We DO know about the Ark and where it is. <br><br>Why? Too man=
y character's histories are tied to it. Most of the Predacons and Maxim=
als that are around on Earth have fought battles there, in fact there was a=
 gigantic battle fought there about a year ago (Real Time). Also one of my =
characters, Legacy, is a guardian of the Ark, although he has been called a=
way to the old Maximal Base for the moment. <br>

      <p>Just a quick question or two :) <br>

I see several posts about having to find the Ark. I thought we knew wh=
ere it was?? Legacy and Lord Elder were guarding it, although Legacy had le=
ft from there to help the Maximals and Autobots at the old Maximal Base. <b=
r>

<br>
I have no problem either way, I just need to know before I have so=
me of the other characters I have do things.<br>
<br>

 to, I can have Lord Elder give Rat Trap a call - he's another characte=
r I was temping before I left. While Elder won't know much about Tuscon=

 getting a bit nervous about him. It's up to you.  <br>

Preston<b=
